SELECT t.*, img.image_url AS url FROM task t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT task_id, MIN(id) AS first_image_id FROM task_image GROUP BY task_id ) ti ON t.id = ti.task_id LEFT JOIN task_image img ON ti.first_image_id = img.id
and t.title like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
and t.uid = #{uid}
order by t.create_time desc
